chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_585
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
aginal delivery
• operator experienced and confident with vaginal breech delivery
• no signs of pelvic contraction on clinical assessment
• estimated fetal weight less than 3.5 kg
• frank or complete breech
• presenting part at or below the level of ischial spines
• labour progress ≥1 cm per hour
Technique of breech delivery 
• Put the mother in lithotomy position.
• Consider an episiotomy after infiltration of the perineum with local anaesthetic.
• E ncourage spontaneous breech delivery and onl
